thread.title: Trump decries FBI raid on personal lawyer

title: Trump decries FBI raid on personal lawyer
text:
Trump decries FBI raid on personal lawyer Tuesday, April 10, 2018 - 02:09 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday tweeted the words ''A TOTAL WITCH HUNT!!!'' likely still venting his rage after FBI agent raided the offices and home of his longtime personal attorney and confidant, Michael Cohen. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
